author: lukaszrozmej
content:
So I think I am finally finished with Nethermind implementation, PR+Code is here: https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/pull/2981 , you can grab packages here: https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/actions/runs/759191477
I need to generate some chainspec and test with some eth2 client. 
Which eth2 client versions are compatible with latest spec: https://notes.ethereum.org/@n0ble/rayonism-the-merge-spec and its easy to set up? Running on windows would be additional plus but its not required.
